name: DDFAP
description:
DDFAP | Digital Draft for an analogue painting
886 × 1063px (1.138.682 Byte)
Klaus Jörres, 2018

In the practice he has built over twenty years, Jörres creates paintings based on renderings and drafts from secondhand Mac computers, manipulating the basic visual structure of modern design, the grid. The cybernetic color palette, in combination with randomly rotations, overlays, repetitions, and cutouts of the linear structures, develop images oscillating between techie disruption and classic abstraction.
